title: Upgraded 2-Bedroom Condo In Cabbagetown
posting_body: Welcome to The Stacks - intown Atlanta's most unique and authentic loft community.
This gorgeous top-floor unit offers 20'+ ceilings, exposed brick, enormous windows and unparalleled views of downtown.
A truly remarkable loft, E419 is the largest floorplan in the building with two bedrooms and two full bathrooms.
The upgraded chef's kitchen features a beautiful herringbone tile backsplash, wine fridge, gas stove, and new stainless appliances.
Enormous mudroom/utility area with washer/dryer and plenty of storage space.
Nest thermostat and smart locks help you stay in control remotely!
The community includes an olympic-sized pool, fitness center, two rooftop decks, dog walks, and secured parking.
If this loft isn't already perfect enough, E419 includes a rare, transferable rental permit.
Stroll to the Beltline, Krog Street, Grant Park, Edgewood Avenue - you're in the center of it all!

170 Boulevard SE #E419 is a condo located in Fulton, the 30312 ZIP Code, and the Parkside Elementary School, Martin Luther King, Jr. Middle School, and Maynard Holbrook Jackson High School attendance zones.
